item.title: How to configure godaddy domain on heroku
item.description: The first step is adding the GoDaddy domain to the Heroku app. Navigate to the project folder from the terminal then type “heroku domains:add www.yourdomain.com”. The domain name is the one purchased from GoDaddy.
